title: Mini lemon and thyme drizzle cakes
description: Miniature versions of the classic lemon drizzle cake are filled with homemade lemon curd and topped with a lemon thyme syrup and candied lemon slices. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 12-hole muffin tin (as straight sided as possible), two piping bags and a small round nozzle.
ingredients: 2 large unwaxed lemons, zest and juice
cake release spray or butter, for greasing
1 tbsp finely chopped lemon thyme leaves
few sprigs fresh lemon thyme, leaves picked
